summary: After a plane crashes a western woman is found by two inhabitants in the middle of the desert. Unable to communicate with the two men and traumatized by the accident, the woman accepts her estranged new life.
cast: Abdrashid Abdrakhmanov|Hodjar Abdullaeva|Farkhad Abdullayev|Dinmukhamet Akhimov|Arielle Dombasle|Inigo Lezzi|M. Christine Vanden Eede|Djavakhir Zakhirov
title: Bo Ba Bu
